LABEL.text:
- Citrine Step 1 (Page Downloadable Apps) [SDK Version 1.0.0]
1. UI Layout
Layout by providing a variety of UI object helps you easily can be placed.
Linear layout, rotation processing are provided.
2. Multi-resolution support
Citrine supports various resolutions for each device(ex : iPhone, iPad, Android, etc),
developer develope application without having to worry about the resolution.
3. Native Code is interlocked.(UI and logic separation)
From Step 1 to provide features that can not be simulated with the XML syntax (the device works,
external works, UI Element's event processing) is to be implemented in native code directly.
4. Theme
Theming capabilities by providing professional-quality design that help you make it easy to set.
Based on Android, iPhone style themes are available.
Provides additional features custom theme.
